name: LEWD; an erotic text adventure
blurb: A sci-fi erotic textual adventure, similar to choose-your-own-adventure erotica.

rewards.reward: Gold Tier Light\r\n\r\nSame as the Gold Tier below, but at a limited discount for early backers.

Gold Tier

-Access to the pre-release website, with forums to discus with staff, other backers, and myself.
-A vote in polls exclusive to backers, so I know what people who supported the game want from it.*
-3 months of a premium account once the game leaves beta.**
-Access to the beta
-Gold forum avatar
(Premium benefits won't be game-breaking. Just some minor benefits in exchange for your support)
*There isn't a guarantee that the poll result will be what I go with, especially if it's a 51% to 49% thing. I may end up doing something that's in the middle with things like that, or I might get a new idea because of the feedback.

**Premium subscription will include some micro-transaction currency each month. I'm not sure how much at the moment, but suffice to say it will include some. Likely $3-$6 for each months worth.

Gold Tier + boost

Same as Gold Tier, plus:
-You'll be able to create more additional characters.
-Your characters will start with slightly more stat and trait points. (Maximum cap doesn't raise)

Gold Tier + Title

Same as Gold Tier + boost, plus:
-You get a custom title that other players will see. Normally titles would be earned from quests, such as "Captain", "Mistress", and so on. With this you can have a custom written one. (Hovering the title will reflect that it is custom, rather than saying how it was earned.)

Gold Tier + NPC

Same as Gold Tier + boost, plus:
-Outline the basic design of an NPC. You can decide their gender, sex, attitude, and sexual /fetish options. We'll work together to figure out a name, location, and species that fit the canon and metaverse. (Species must fit canon, but I will add a new species if I like the idea)
Platinum Tier Light\r\n\r\nSame as the Platinum Tier below, but at a limited discount for early backers. (Except it does not include name in credits)

Platinum Tier

-$30 worth of microtransaction credits.
-Name/nick, in the credits
-12 months of a premium account once the game leaves beta
-Votes in polls exclusive to backers worth 5x as much
-Access to the alpha
-Platinum forum avatar
-Additional character slots
-Additiona starting character stats & traits. (Maximum cap doesn't raise)

Platinum Tier + Special NPC

Same as Platinum Tier, plus:
-Outline a basic NPC just like Gold Tier + NPC, but get additional features on the NPC that require hard coding, for example:
*A merchant NPC with a list of items that can buy and sell items(and you can deposit and withdraw currency)
*An NPC that is part of a quest, with possible special quest rewards, a title reward, so on
*An NPC with combat
*A "companion" NPC that can be earned by other players. (And you can get stat reporting on them, ie: times specific dialog options were chosen)
*I'm open to suggestions on something else specific that you want that requires special coding, but be aware that I may not accept it and you'll have to fall back to another.
You can also pick this tier if you have a specific NPC that you or a friend want to write, and if it's approved I'll hard code additional features on it.

Unobtanium Tier

Platinum Tier benefits or greater:
-$150 worth of microtransaction credits.
-Votes in polls exclusive to backers worth 15x as much
-Super shiny Unobtanium Tier avatar.

Unobtanium Tier + Design a _____

Unobtanium Tier, plus:
-I was going to say design an item, but I'm open to designing other things here too. (Like a ship, or zone, or something else I haven't thought of. You can also use this to have a special NPC + unobtanium tier)
-Name the thing, within reason, ie "Gay Ray"
-Lay out what it does, ie "Needed in a quest to, well, what do you think it does?"
-Add in some easter eggs, ie "Can forget about the quest and zap other players with it instead to say 'player1 zapped player2 with a brilliant rainbow beam from his/her Gay Ray' to the chat and change their orientation to homosexual." Of course, players can change their orientation back freely once they notice it~
-Credit for designing it.

Unobtanium Tier + Character picture
Unobtanium tier benefits, plus:
The same artist doing artwork for the game's portraits will do a full size, full color picture of your own character that can match the style of the rest of the game.
You'll get in contactwith him and tell him how you want your character to look, just like you would with a commission of your own.

Unobtanium Tier + Rule your own f'ing planet

Unobtanium Tier benefits, plus:
-Your character will be named ruler/owner of a planet or station of your choice. (a few planets may be off limits, such as ones where that wouldn't fit their culture. A planet/station will contain many, many zones, with the demo being one very unfinished zone)
-A title of your choice such as Lord, Baroness, Lady which on hover shows text about the planet you rule over.
-NPCs will mention your character's name when ever appropriate to other players. Some may even announce your presence to other players in the area when you enter that area, and other things.
-You have some say in the areas and life on the planet, but again it has to fit what I'm looking for.
-Add in your choice of designing four items or eight special NPCs. Or you can tell me something else specific that you'd want, and I might grant that.(Otherwise, fall back to 4 items/8npcs)
*Obviously, you need to not have an offensive character name here.
